string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Kim Kardashian was born in Los Angeles on October 21, 1980."
"She is the daughter of Kris Jenner and the late attorney Robert Kardashian."
"She is the second oldest of four, with older sister Kourtney and younger siblings Khloe and Robert."
"During high school, Kim worked at her father’s music marketing firm, Movie Tunes."
"Kim’s first acting role came in 2006 in the television series \"Beyond the Break\"."
"According to E!, Kim makes $5.545 million a year."
"Kardashian appeared as a guest judge on Cycle 13 of America’s Next Top Model."
"Kim posed nude in the December 2007 issue of Playboy magazine."
"In April 2009, Kardashian released a workout DVD series, \"Fit in Your Jeans by Friday,\" with trainers Jennifer Galardi and Patrick Goudeau."
"Kim Kardashian is the co-founder and chief fashion stylist for ShoeDazzle."
"In the spring of 2010, Kim and her sisters released a clothing line for Bebe. They also own Dash clothing store."
"In 2000, Kardashian married music producer Damon Thomas. They divorced in 2004."
"Kim was partnered with Mark Ballas on season 7 of Dancing with the Stars, but was the third contestant voted off."
"Kim starred in the 2008 film spoof “Disaster Movie” as Lisa."
"Kim considers singer/actress Jennifer Lopez to be her style icon."
"Dr. Sanford Siegal, the creator of the Cookie Diet, sued Kardashian, claiming she defamed him on Twitter."
"According to Siegal, Kardashian tweeted that he was \"falsely promoting\" that she was on the cookie diet."
"Kim worked as a wardrobe stylist for television shows and photo shoots."
"She was the closet designer for Cindy Crawford, Nicole Richie, Kathie Lee Gifford and Kenny G."
"The reality star celebrated her 14th birthday at Michael Jackson’s Neverland Ranch."
"Kim Kardashian’s first boyfriend was Tito Jackson’s son, T.J."
"Deep-fried Oreos are Kim’s favorite sweet. \"If I like a food, I’ll eat it, even if I know it’s not good for me\"."
"Kim appears in the Fall Out Boy music video \"Thnks fr th Mmrs\" and gets cozy with bassist Pete Wentz."
"Kim rarely drinks alcohol, but when she does, she enjoys sipping on a White Russian."
"Kim once said, \"I want to be a Bond Girl and film a love scene with Daniel Craig after he’s rescued me\"."
"Kim released her own perfume \"Kim Kardashian\" in February 2010."
"Famous Cupcakes in Los Angeles created a vanilla cupcake mix for Kim. It’s called Va-Va-Va-Nilla."
"Kardashian is the producer of \"SPINdustry,\" a reality show about Command PR, a NYC public relations firm run by Jonathan Cheban and Simon Huck."
"Kim’s favorite movies include \"Clueless\" and \"The Notebook\"."
"n 2009, Kim had a severe case of sunburn she got on a trip to Mexico that made the news."
"Kim is ranked #10 in the \"100 Hottest Brunettes of AIM\"."
"Kim was nominated for a 2009 Razzie Award for Worst Supporting Actress in the film, Disaster Movie."
"The first fashion show Kim ever walked in was fashion designer, Christian Audigier's first fashion show he ever led at Locke High School."
"Kim used to be Paris Hilton's best friend."
"Kim believes in Christianity."
"Kim likes to sky dive, ski, and play outside sports."
"In 2007, Kim released a workout video."
"Kim admits that the hardest celebrity closet to organize was Paris Hilton because she had so many clothes that she had to convert a bedroom into a closet."
"Kim has said that she would love to give Britney Spears a style makeover."
"In 2008, Kim made #3 on the E! list of the best beach bodies."
"Kim admits that she does not know as much about her Armenian culture as she would like to know."
"Kim's godmother is Sugar Ray's wife, Bernadette Leonard."
"Kim was named number 28 of the Top 99 Most Desirable Women of 2008."
"Kim was married to actor Damon Thomas III from 2000-2004."
"Kim is 5' 2" (1.57 m) tall."
"Kim is of Turkish Armenian, Russian Armenian, Irish, and German descent."
"On E!, Kim is \"The Bombshell\"."
"By her sisters, Kim is known as the diva of the family."
"Kim was in a sextape with RnB singer Ray J."
"Kim used to date actor/rapper Nick Cannon. Kim has also been reported to have dated Nick Lachey, Ray J, The Game, Damon Thomas, Jeremy Ferrer, Reggie Bush and Marques Houston."
"Birth Name: Kimberly Noel Kardashian "
"Kim Kardashian’s name is searched on Google over 9 million times per month."
"Her dad, who passed away in 2003, was Robert Kardashian, an attorney in the O.J. Simpson trial."
"Kim’s zodiac sign is Libra. Libras are flirtatious, self-indulgent, gullible, charming, elegant and good looking."
"In an interview with Matt Lauer, Kim called herself a \"loner\"."

"Kim earns as much as $50,00 per appearance. She shows up somewhere, take pictures, has fun and gets paid. For example, she got paid $25k per hour to party at Tao nightclub in Las Vegas in 2009. Not too shabby…"
"Her first boyfriend was Tito Jackson’s son. Kim Kardashian’s family were friends with the Jacksons, in fact, her fourteenth birthday party was at Michael Jackson infamous Neverland Ranch."
"Her step father is an Olympic God Medalist. Bruce Jenner competed in the 1976 Olympic Games."
"She was guest host as a wrestlemania XXIV."
"She has worked with her sisters Kourteney and Khloe to write an biography called Kardashian Konfidential."
"No matter what your view on Kim Kardashian or her sisters, if she really did donate 10% of her earnings she at least has a good heart."
"She donated 10% of her estimated 2010 earnings of $6 million to charity."
